title: Getting More Flavor At The Grill
teaser: Here & Now resident chef Kathy Gunst offers recipes for rubs and marinades to add more flavor into your grilled meat, fish and vegetables.
contentencoded:
Memorial Day is often considered the start of grilling season. But how do you get more flavor into your meat, fish or vegetables?

We revisit our conversation with Here & Now resident chef Kathy Gunst about rubs, marinades and what she modestly calls “the best barbecue sauce.”

For recipes, click here.

Guest

  • Kathy Gunst, resident chef for Here & Now and author of “Notes from a Maine Kitchen” and the video series “Simple Soups from Scratch.” She tweets @mainecook.
